body: Hi Ravenleaf, thank you for sharing it with us. Just fyi, sites like nhentai, hitomi la, etc. are just mirror/reupload of a portion of exhentai main database so if you want a manga to be posted on nhentai you need to upload it through exhentai.
ah for sure makes sense.  I should have actually looked at what it in the japanese version first I guess lmao.  Thanks again.  Too bad there isn't even more of that threesome though
@anotherperv whats missing is isolated chapters of side stories that actually were already translated. I wasn't going to pay to have things translated that were already done.

Hey ravenleaf appreciate you commissioning that and had no trouble getting the 7zip archives to extract, just wanted to confirm that there was no mixup because it seems the source for this doujin has 239 pages and while there are pages labeled at 239 in the archive it skips about 80 pages before the end.  Looked like the same images on both your imgur and in the mediafire links.  Just for reference the link in japanese on here is at https://nhentai.net/g/134007/ Either way appreciate you shelling out for this
@Ravenleaf thank you very much it worked

as a last resort, I spent like 3 hours putting it on imgur, but I still accidently got some pages mixed up (they seem to only be off by one page so you reverse them, the only one I caught actually is when she makes him drink his cum out of his sock, its supposed to be she makes him drink>puts sock on his head>goes for walk, I think I have it drinks>walks>puts sock on head) so its errors like that. Its up to you to fix the order if you save them/figure it out, I spent so much time uploading this here and trying to re-arrange it right:
https://imgur.com/a/RdOxA
@TheFive you downloaded both parts and extracted them to the same folder? you have to have both and extract both to the same folder, it should prompt you for the password there
@Ravenleaf thank you very much but when i open the file and enter the Passwort nothing happens and the Folder is empty

also this is a correction for page 125 as there was a mistranslation:
https://i.imgur.com/DD4Yldh.jpg

Iexpectedbetter is an asshole. I have paid for and this is mine with no obligation to share. Especially when he was so rude to me on other titles. However, Mame and Fakewars, you're pretty chill, and this title is too good not to share with people who are into this. Sidenote, hardcore as I am, even I feel bad for the guy. I found my original download link from tigoris, so hopefully you can use it too: http://www.mediafire.com/download/w9vxsvxvj33wypt/Invoice+276%2C+294%2C+305.7z.001 http://www.mediafire.com/download/0z55d04s5368751/Invoice+276%2C+294%2C+305.7z.002 Password: rumpelstiltskin (for both files.)
@Ravenleaf what subreddit are you uploading on?
@Ravenleaf please do share the link
I am not on snapchat, I'll try uploading it on reddit and see if it gets here. I tried on e hentai before, but the sign up and such was so shady I didn't want to risk it.
@Ravenleaf are you on Snapchat if yes i will give you my user name
@ravenleaf or just upload it to any file sharing site. Share it in 4chan, reddit, or anywhere else. It will eventually made it to exhentai and nhentai later.
@Ravenleaf upload it to e hentai, it will eventually be reposted here
this is actually pretty good
@Iexpectedbetter I am not lying I paid and got it translated, if I could find a place to share it I would.
Wating for it so badly
wat
FINALLY this is translated.
why just why
I literally have this entire thing translated, I've tried getting it uploaded but I have no idea how.
